body: first part of a masterpiece and not translated...

Based on my intuition from what this artist posts on its Twitter, I strongly believe it's a female artist and she's damn good at it. I love her art and reading her original works makes me very happy. It's such a shame so many of her works are untranslated as of late.

With ntr and rape they can just copy paste the dialogue so obv there's more being translated.

Stuff like this takes a bit more time. Since these types have varied scenarios and characters between them. That's not the case with the former.
@KoCo77 indeed, so many ntr shit is translated yet this piece of artwork only has 2 translations (series).
KoCo77 yeah like we need some of his untranslated masterpiece to be translated
Not enough of this mans works have been translated and that's goddam criminal at this point
